name: starter-saas-minimal
description: Next.js 14 SaaS + Shop starter with shadcn/ui, dashboard shell, product catalog, cart, and checkout. TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, App Router.
postMessage:
SaaS starter installed! Run:
1. npm install
2. npx shadcn@latest add button card badge input sheet dropdown-menu avatar separator select tabs switch label
3. npm run dev

See app/(dashboard) for admin pages and app/(shop) for storefront.
